dstm2

Interface ContentionManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AggressiveManager, BackoffManager, BaseManager, EruptionManager, GreedyManager, KarmaManager, KindergartenManager, PriorityManager

    public interface ContentionManager
    Interface satisfied by all contention managers

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void committed()
      Notify manager that transaction committed.
      long getPriority()
      Assign a priority to caller.
      void openSucceeded()
      Notify manager that object was opened.
      void resolveConflict(Transaction me, java.util.Collection<Transaction> other)
      Either give the writer a chance to finish it, abort it, or both.
      void resolveConflict(Transaction me, Transaction other)
      Either give the writer a chance to finish it, abort it, or both.
      void setPriority(long value)
      Change this manager's priority.

    • Method Detail

      • resolveConflict

        void resolveConflict(Transaction me,
                   Transaction other)
        Either give the writer a chance to finish it, abort it, or both.
        Parameters:
        me - Calling transaction.
        other - Transaction that's in my way.

      • resolveConflict

        void resolveConflict(Transaction me,
                   java.util.Collection<Transaction> other)
        Either give the writer a chance to finish it, abort it, or both.
        Parameters:
        me - Calling transaction.
        other - set of transactions in my way

      • getPriority

        long getPriority()
        Assign a priority to caller. Not all managers assign meaningful priorities.
        Returns:
        Priority of conflicting transaction.

      • setPriority

        void setPriority(long value)
        Change this manager's priority.
        Parameters:
        value - new priority value

      • openSucceeded

        void openSucceeded()
        Notify manager that object was opened.

      • committed

        void committed()
        Notify manager that transaction committed.
